strapiPost.title: Nautical Bowls Hosts Grand Opening In Fayetteville This Saturday
strapiPost.content:
Don't miss the grand opening of Nautical Bowls this Saturday, Mar 4, at 1113 W MLK Jr. Blvd., where the first 50 customers will receive a free superfood bowl.

  • Live full: Founded in Minnesota, Nautical Bowls is bringing its passion for active living and healthy food to Fayetteville along with a menu of healthy, fresh Açaí superfood bowls that are gluten-free, dairy-free, soy-free, and contain no refined sugars.
  • Making an entrance: The opening celebration will include music, door prizes, and a chance for guests to win big by entering "The Beginning of an Era" Sweepstakes.

Keep up with Nautical Bowls on Instagram HERE.
